MCGOWAN / BARRYMORE / STILLER / ALBA / VIRGO / LEE / DEPP





(McGowan div=
es, rolling on the ground avoiding the 5 energy balls and jumping back on h=
er feet. She fires a missile at Nightlight and a missile at Termitron.)



=
(Barrymore takes 2 energy balls to her left shoulder and ducks the other 3.=
 She fires 5 laser beams at Termitron and 5 at Nightlight.)



(Stiller fir=
es 2 arrows at Termitron and 2 at Nightlight.)



(Alba throws herself into=
 a backflip, dodging the acid. She fires 6 shots at Termitron and 6 at Nigh=
tlight.)



(Virgo fires 5 yellow paralyzing darts at Termitron along with =
5 red energy draining darts.)



(Lee is struck by the rapids and fires a f=
ireball at Nightlight and a fireball at Termitron.)



(Depp is struck by t=
he energy balls and stares. He lands on the ground and pulls his katana out=
. He starts to approach Nightlight...)

rom: airly2000@...

tarstromp


  Nightlight/Termitron::

  Termitron had left Starstromp in a =
cr and he ran outside and 
  shouted "By the ROyalty and by the colony", ba=
se's shield turned on 

  He fired 5 times against Stranato, 5 against Stro=
nghold, 10 against 
  Blender and 5 times against Airbomber. He spat his Ac=
yd to Alba.

  Nightlight had a bad while that time, McGowan's missile fell=
 near her 
  an that made her react, the convined attack off Barrymore, Dep=
p and 
  Lee, made her suffer  a lot pain while Virgo's dart was draining h=
er 
  energy.

  "Help!" shouted the femme"Help me please..."

  She dificu=
lty could stoon up and fired 25 energy-balls: 5 to McGowan, 
  5 against Ba=
rrymore, 5 against Depp and 10 against Lee.
